title: Super Mario Run Available for Download on Google Play
text:
Share this Story Super Mario Run Available for Download on Google Play 
It‚Äôs a day before Super Mario Run is supposed to be available for Android devices, so just in case it‚Äôs an error, go grab it now! Cheers Ryan and Matt! Post navigation

Not from my viewpoint, but to gauge early interest‚Ä¶ I get that. Pinteresting. About Droid Life
